title: Hangart Ikarita
more_info_prefix: Urashaka aho utangirira cyangwa amabwiriza menshi? Jya kuri
hero_tagline: Buri gihangano cyakozwe n'amaboko kandi kivuga inkuru
global_selection_desc: Vumbura ibikorwa by'umwimerere bikomoka ku bahanzi batangira ku isi.
free_returns_desc: Gusubiza bidagoranye kugira ngo ugure wiringiye.
top_rated_desc: Ibihumbi by'ibitekerezo bya nyenyeri 5 biva ku bakusanyije ku isi.
testimonials_subtitle: Byizigishwa n'ibihumbi by'abakunzi b'ubuhanzi ku isi
brand.name: Hangart
footer.about: Vumbura ibihangano by'umwimerere by'abahanzi batangiye ku isi. Ibyegeranyo bya resitora, amafoto, igishusho n'ibindi.
footer.newsletter_desc: Iyandikishe kugira ngo ubone amakuru n'ibidasanzwe.

gallery.title: Ububiko
gallery.subtitle: Vumbura ibihangano by'udushya by'abahanzi b'abanyempano ku isi

login.welcome_desc: Injira kugira ngo uyobore ibihangano byawe, ibyo waguze n'ububiko.
login.title: Kwinjira
login.redirect_checkout: Nylyoha winjire kugira ngo ukomeze ku kugura

museums.title: Muzee & Imurikagukora
museums.subtitle: Menya ibyamamaza n'imurikagukora — kanda Gusura kugira ngo wige byinshi.

about.hero_subtitle: Isoko rihuza abahanzi b'abanyempano n'abakunzi b'ubuhanzi.

artist_support.title: Gufasha abahanzi
artist_support.desc: Dushyigikira abahanzi binyuze mu mafaranga akwiye n'ibikoresho bibafasha gukura.

authentic_art.title: Ubugeni bw'umwimerere
authentic_art.desc: Buri gihangano ni icy'umwimerere kandi cyagenzuwe.

community_first.title: Umuryango mbere
community_first.desc: Duteza imbere umuryango uhuza kandi ushigikira.

global_access.title: Kwigezwaho ku isi
global_access.desc: Kuzana hamwe abahanzi n'abakunzi ku isi yose.

mission.title: Intego zacu
mission.body: Kugira ngo ubugeni bube bwegereye buri wese no gushyigikira abahanzi.
mission.cta: Jyana natwe kandi uhashakemo ubugeni bugushimisha

story.title: Inkomoko yacu
story.p1: HangArt yatangijwe n'abahanzi n'abakunzi b'ubuhanzi n'igitekerezo cyoroshye.
story.p2: Ubu dushyigikira abahanzi ibihumbi ku isi hose.

homeGallery.title: Reba ububiko bw'ibihangano
homeGallery.subtitle: Vumbura ibihangano byihariye by'abahanzi b'abanyempano ku isi

search.placeholder: Shakisha ku izina, isobanuro cyangwa izina ry'umuhanzi...

sarah_johnson.comment: Ubwiza bw'igihangano bwararenze ibyo nari niteze. Igihangano naguze cyabaye umutima w'inzu yanjye. Kohereza byagenze vuba kandi gupakira kwari ku rwego rwo hejuru.

michael_chen.comment: Maze imyaka irenga 20 nkusanya ubugeni, kandi Hangart Gallery ifite ibice byihariye cyane. Serivisi y'abakiliya yangiriye akamaro mu gusubiza ibibazo byanjye byose.

emma_rodriguez.comment: Nk'umukozi wabigize umwuga, nishimira ukuri n'itandukanye ry'ibihangano. Buri gihangano gifite inkuru, kandi uru rubuga ryoroshya kumenya abahanzi bashya.

david_kim.comment: Ishoramari mu bihangano by'iri soko ryashobokeye neza. Nkunda ibihangano kandi agaciro kabyo kiyongereye uko igihe gitambuka. Ndabigira inama!

sophie_martin.comment: Urutonde rw'amafoto rwiza cyane! Nabonye igihangano gikwiye ku biro byanjye byo mu rugo. Kwishyura byari byoroshye kandi kohereza byageze igihe.

james_wilson.comment: Nkunda gushyigikira abahanzi batangiye binyuze kuri uru rubuga. Gutoranya ibihangano ni byiza kandi namenye abahanzi batandukanye nkurikiranira hafi.
